recipes.title: Aloo Paratha
recipes.instructions: Boil potatoes, mash with spices, stuff in dough, roll and cook with ghee on tawa.

recipes.title: Chicken Curry
recipes.instructions: Cook onions till brown, add chicken and spices, simmer until cooked.

recipes.title: Masala Dosa
recipes.instructions: Spread batter on tawa, add potato stuffing, fold and serve with chutney.

recipes.title: Paneer Butter Masala
recipes.instructions: Cook paneer in rich tomato gravy with butter and cream.

recipes.title: Veg Momos
recipes.instructions: Stuff veggies inside dough, steam and serve with spicy sauce.

recipes.title: Chocolate Cake
recipes.instructions: Mix all ingredients, bake for 30 minutes at 180Â°C.

recipes.title: Idli Sambhar
recipes.instructions: Steam idli batter, serve with hot sambhar.

recipes.title: Biryani
recipes.instructions: Layer rice & meat with spices, cook on dum.
